description:
nova.virt.driver.ComputeDriver.check_can_live_migrate_destination and check_can_live_migrate_source docstrings should specify the expected return type.

https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1129091 is caused by returning None in the corresponding overridden methods. This used to work when the method was committed and stopped to work recently due to changes not related to the actual driver, based on the undocumented assumption that the mentioned method returns a dictionary.
title: nova.virt.driver.ComputeDriver.check_can_live_migrate_destination docstring should specify the return type

comments.content:
nova.virt.driver.ComputeDriver.check_can_live_migrate_destination and check_can_live_migrate_source docstrings should specify the expected return type.

https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1129091 is caused by returning None in the corresponding overridden methods. This used to work when the method was committed and stopped to work recently due to changes not related to the actual driver, based on the undocumented assumption that the mentioned method returns a dictionary.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alexpilotti
